terms.required: You must accept the terms and conditions to continue

company.norwegian-companies-note: For Norwegian companies, you must search and select your company from BrÃ¸nnÃ¸ysundregistrene.
company.help-start-typing: Start typing company name (3+ characters) or enter 9-digit organization number

confirmation.company: Company selected: {companyName}. Your property details will be collected in the next step.
confirmation.incomplete: Please complete your selection above to continue.

hms-card.description: Please upload your HMS (Health, Safety and Environment) card

cleaner.experience-placeholder: Describe where you've worked, responsibilities, and years

terms.title: Terms and Conditions

contact-form.name: Name
contact-form.privacy-text: I accept that you can contact me via email. Read our
contact-form.we-have-received-your-message: We have received your message and will contact you as soon as possible, usually within 1-2 working days.
contact-form.check-your-email: Check your email for a confirmation message. If you don't find it, check your spam folder.

bookingForm.title: Book Cleaning Service
bookingForm.description: Schedule a cleaning service for one of your properties. Prices are automatically calculated based on property size and service type.

card.title: Payouts via Stripe Connect
card.desc: Set up your payout details to get paid securely to your bank account.
card.secure: Stripe handles verification and payouts. Your data is secure.
card.refreshError: Failed to refresh account status. Please try again.

noBookings.title: No Bookings Yet
noBookings.description: You haven't booked any cleaning services yet. Book your first service to get started!

actions.bookAgainHint: Use the booking form at the top left to create a new booking

cancel.confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking? This action cannot be undone.
cancel.error: Failed to cancel booking. Please try again.

edit.title: Edit Booking
edit.description: Update your booking details. You can only edit bookings that haven't been assigned to a cleaner yet.

specialInstructions.label: Special Instructions
specialInstructions.placeholder: Any specific requirements or notes for the cleaner...

empty.title: No Jobs Available
empty.desc: There are currently no cleaning jobs available. Check back later!
empty.descFiltered: No jobs match your current filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.

actions.requestSuccess: Job request submitted! The landlord will review your request.
actions.requestError: Failed to submit job request. Please try again.

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.account_desc: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings.deletion_pending: This account is pending deletion. It will be processed within 30 days.

export.title: Export your data
export.desc: Download a JSON export of your profile and related data.

delete.title: Request account deletion
delete.desc: Permanently delete your profile and associated data.

form.instructionsPlaceholder: Any specific requirements or access instructions...
form.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields

paymentInfo.title: How Payment Works
paymentInfo.description: Your payment is secure and protected throughout the cleaning process.

step1.title: Payment Authorization
step1.description: When you book, we authorize your payment method but don't charge you yet. Your money is safely held.

step2.title: Payment Capture
step2.description: Payment is only charged when the cleaner arrives and starts the job with a photo confirmation.

step3.title: Service Completion
step3.description: The cleaner gets paid only after completing the job and uploading an 'after' photo for your approval.

guarantee.title: 100% Protected
guarantee.description: You only pay if the cleaner shows up and completes the work.

deep.title: Deep Cleaning
deep.description: Thorough cleaning for move-ins or seasonal refresh

form.instructionsPlaceholder: Any specific requirements or access instructions...
form.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields

payment.title: Payment Details
payment.subtitle: Secure payment powered by Stripe
payment.savePaymentMethod: Save payment method for future bookings
payment.securityNotice: Your payment information is encrypted and secure
payment.serviceBooked: Your cleaning service has been booked.

errors.systemNotReady: Payment system not ready. Please try again.
errors.paymentNotCompleted: Payment was not completed. Please try again.
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.initializationFailed: Failed to initialize payment. Please try again.

noProperties.title: No properties yet
noProperties.description: You haven't added any properties yet. Add your first property to get started with cleaning services.

size.label: Size (mÂ²)

isActive.label: Property is active and available for cleaning services

activeJobs.title: Active Jobs

activeJobs.noActiveJobs: No active jobs. Check the Jobs tab to find available work.
activeJobs.startSuccess: Job started! Payment has been captured.
activeJobs.startSuccessCaptureError: Job started but payment capture failed
activeJobs.startError: Failed to start job. Please try again.
activeJobs.completeSuccess: Job completed! You will receive payment shortly.
activeJobs.completeSuccessPayoutPending: Job completed! Payment is being processed by Stripe and will be transferred to your account automatically within 2-7 business days.
activeJobs.completeError: Failed to complete job. Please try again.

jobStart.description: Review the details and confirm you're ready to start

confirm.readyToStart: I am ready to begin the cleaning

jobComplete.title: Complete Job
jobComplete.description: Confirm that all work has been completed

checklist.title: Completion Checklist

checklist.instructions: All special instructions have been followed
checklist.clean: The area is clean and ready for use

cleanerSelection.selectSuccess: Cleaner selected! They will be notified and can start the job on the scheduled date.

jobDetails.description: Detailed information about this cleaning job
